name: gns3-mcp
description: Control and automate GNS3 network labs through Claude
long_description: This desktop extension provides comprehensive control over GNS3 network simulation labs. Manage projects, start/stop nodes, access device consoles, and automate complex network topology operations. Supports GNS3 v3 API with telnet console access for router configuration and troubleshooting.

gns3_host.title: GNS3 Server Host
gns3_host.description: GNS3 server hostname or IP address

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all GNS3 projects with their status (opened/closed)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a GNS3 project by name

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in the current project with status and console info

tools.name: get_node_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific node

tools.name: start_node
tools.description: Start a node in the current project

tools.name: stop_node
tools.description: Stop a node in the current project

tools.name: connect_console
tools.description: Connect to a node's telnet console and return session ID

tools.name: send_console
tools.description: Send commands or keystrokes to a console session

tools.name: read_console_diff
tools.description: Read only new console output since last read
